articles.author: Francesco Guarascio
articles.content: BRUSSELS (Reuters) - Johnson & Johnson has told the European Union it is facing supply issues that may complicate plans to deliver 55 million doses of its COVID-19 vaccine to the bloc in the seco… [+4444 chars]
articles.description: Johnson & Johnson has told the European Union it is facing supply issues that may complicate plans to deliver 55 million doses of its COVID-19 vaccine to the bloc in the second quarter of the year, an EU official told Reuters.
articles.title: Exclusive: J&J 'under stress' to meet EU second-quarter vaccine supply goal - source - Reuters
